title: Monk's Belt
info: The Monk's Belt is an accessory that increases the maximum number of sentries by one and increases minion damage by 10%. Neither of its bonuses stack with Apprentice's Scarf, Squire's Shield or Huntress's Buckler. It fits well with the Monk armor set. It has a T2: 8.33% / 12.5% T3: 4.16% chance of being dropped by the Ogre during the Old One's Army event.
